title: Using Fedora Linux as Daily Driver for Years [Real Tips]
description:
Here are a few tips to keep using Fedora Linux as your daily driver for many years, based on actual experiences.

The post Using Fedora Linux as Daily Driver for Years [Real Tips] appeared first on Linux Today.

title: AlmaLinux vs. Rocky Linux: In-Depth Server Comparison
description:
We’ll be exploring the key features of AlmaLinux and Rocky Linux, benchmark performance and stability, delving into their unique security capabilities, and weighing the level of community support and development — all crucial factors to help you decide between Rocky Linux and AlmaLinux as your preferred CentOS replacement.

The post AlmaLinux vs. Rocky Linux: In-Depth Server Comparison appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Pacman 6.1.0 Introduces Cache Server Support
description:
Arch Linux’s Pacman 6.1.0 introduces cache server support, an improved sysroot option, better handling of corrupt packages, and more.

The post Pacman 6.1.0 Introduces Cache Server Support appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Install VNC Server on CentOS
description:
In this tutorial, we will show you how to install the VNC server on CentOS 8 Server. We use TigerVNC as the VNC server and Gnome Desktop for the graphical user interface.

The post How to Install VNC Server on CentOS appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Install Xfce on AlmaLinux 9 or 8
description:
This guide shows how to install Xfce on AlmaLinux 9 or 8 with a full step-by-step rundown using the command-line terminal.

The post How to Install Xfce on AlmaLinux 9 or 8 appeared first on Linux Today.
